# Pyrolysis

## Pyrolysis products
```{r pyrolysis_product}
knitr::kable(pyr_unk_bip_prop, caption = "Proportion of all product (%)")
knitr::kable(filter(py_prop, layer == "Humus")[, -1], caption = "Propotion of pyrolysis product for humus")
knitr::kable(filter(py_prop, layer == "Litter")[, -1], caption = "Propotion of pyrolysis product for litter")
knitr::kable(py_prop_CH, caption = "Propotion in carbohydrate")
knitr::kable(py_Ncomp_ind, caption = "Propotion in N compouds")
```

## Pyrolysis RDA
```{r pyrolysis_rda, results='markup'}
knitr::kable(anova(pyr_humus_rda, nperm = 4999), caption = "RDA on pyrolysis for humus")
knitr::kable(anova(pyr_litter_rda, nperm = 4999), caption = "RDA on pyrolysis for litter")
```


# NMR

## NMR products
```{r nmr_product}
knitr::kable(filter(nmr_prop, layer == "Humus")[, -1], caption = "Propotion of NMR product for humus")
knitr::kable(filter(nmr_prop, layer == "Litter")[, -1], caption = "Propotion of NMR product for litter")
```

## NMR RDA
```{r nmr_rda}
knitr::kable(anova(nmr_humus_rda, nperm = 4999), caption = "RDA on NMR for humus")
knitr::kable(anova(nmr_litter_rda, nperm = 4999), caption = "RDA on NMR for litter")
```


# Carbohydrate:Lignin ratios
```{r CLratio}
knitr::kable(Anova(cl_leafd15N_m1, test.statistic = "F"), caption = "Carbohydrate:Ligninratio vs. leaf d15 N")
knitr::kable(Anova(Cmass_lcr_m1, test.statistic = "F"), caption = "C mass vs. Carbohydrate:Ligninratio")
```
